weapons.name: Stapler
weapons.description: Red, metalic, and not particularly heavy.
uses: You click your stapler, pretending it's the mouth of an alien.
You open and close your stapler and fiddle with its release switches.
Holding your stapler menacingly, you ponder its merits as a bludgeoning device.
With your trusty stapler, you feel like you can conquer the world.

weapons.name: Pencil
weapons.description: A cheap mechanical pencil.  It's running out of lead
uses: Tapping your pencil produces a few irritated looks by your neighbors.
You imagine your pencil is really a stiletto.  Watch out world.
Using your pencil, you doodle on a scratch piece of paper.

weapons.name: Spoon
weapons.description: It's not particularly useful in every situation, but I'm sure you're likely to try to make it work anyway.
uses: You brandish your spoon like a talisman.  The Tick would be proud.
Using an epic strain of imagination, you pretend to eat a bowl of cereal.  Too bad there's none available for realsies.
Hey, wasn't a spoon used to design one of the classic Trek starships?  No?  Well, it was just a thought.
Glancing down at the spoon in your hand, you ponder your next meal.

weapons.name: Your Bare Hands
weapons.description: There's a lot you can do with your hands.  You can do even more if you find a tool and take advantage of that opposable thumb.
uses: Cleaning your nails may not accomplish much, but it's oddly comforting to know it's done.
No, this problem isn't going to be solved by punching it.  Still, it's fun to imagine.  Time passes.
Well, I have to hand it to you, you're starting to look productive.
Violence isn't always the answer.  Neither is staring at the problem with your eyes crossed.
You actually attempt to get things done.

items.name: Empty
items.description: There is nothing there, nothing at all.

items.name: Coffee Station
items.description: There is a Keurig, a series of coffee makers, and several coffee thermoses for storing the vital elixir.

items.name: A Fresh Clean Feeling
items.description: Nothing beats that fresh clean feeling in the early morning

items.name: A Refrigerator
items.description: It's tall and white and makes a low humming noise.  There may be food in it.  It may also contain an unspeakable horror.

items.name: The Microwave
items.description:
It's not just any old appliance, but a heroic device that speeds you about your way.  You really
 should appreciate it more than you do.

items.name: The Work Fridges
items.description:
They seem like perfectly normal refrigerators but danger and ruin may lurk within.  You vaguely recall they
 were cleaned out recently so it should be safe.

items.name: A Drawer
items.description: Thank goodness it's the cutlery one.  If it was the junk drawer, you'd be risking life and limb.

items.name: Over-caffeinated
items.description: Your consumption of too much caffeine has given you the jitters and the need to use the restroom.

items.name: RSI Fob
items.description: This talisman gives you the power of opening and closing.

items.name: Wet Hands
items.description:
Your hands are more than just a bit damp, they are wet.  Everything you touch becomes soggy.  
A paper towel could really come in handy right about now.

items.name: Unconsolable Guilt
items.description: You did something you shouldn't have.  You know it and it's eating you up inside.  Really, you're a better person than this.

items.name: Rotten Food
items.description:
This is either really old food or been left out for longer than is safe.  It doesn't stink yet, but
 would probably make you sick if you ate it.

consumable.name: Coffee
consumable.description:
A caustic substance used to fuel most activities.
Drinking this provides 10 points of energy.
consumable.use: You take a big gulp of your coffee.  It's just the way you like it and you feel a burst of energy.

consumable.name: A Hearty Breakfast
consumable.description:
Okay, really it's probably just some instant oatmeal or a poached egg, but whatever gets
 you going in the morning is fine by me.
 Eating this provides 10 points of energy.
consumable.use: Eating this meal just might be the high point of your day.  You feel like you can take on the world.

consumable.name: Leftovers
consumable.description:
Food that was so good you've saved some for later.
Eating this provides 5 points of energy.
consumable.use: You dig into leftovers.  They aren't as good as they were the last time you ate this meal.

consumable.name: Can of soda
consumable.description:
Chilled and caffienated, it's a good pick-me-up.
Drinking this provides 4 points of energy.
consumable.use: You drink the can of soda, reveling in the energy it provides.

consumable.name: Paper Towel Sheet
consumable.description: An ancient and valuable form of currency, still prized for its absorbancy.
consumable.use: You wipe your hands with the precious Paper Towel.  Its use done, you resign it to the trash can and mourn the loss.

consumable.name: Somebody Else's Lunch
consumable.description:
First off, it's not yours.  Second, there's no telling how long it's been sitting where you found it.  You should
 feel ashamed for just looking at it.
consumable.use: Despite the warnings from the narrator, you callously consume somebody else's lunch.  It actually tasted pretty good...  You monster...

gear.name: Rumpled Shirt
gear.description: It's freshly washed, but sat in a laundry hamper a few days to get good and wrinkly.

gear.name: Blue Jeans
gear.description: These are well worn but mostly sans holes.  It's just about time to buy a new pair.

gear.name: Unicorn Mask
gear.description: It's white and rubbery and creepy.  Wearing this mask isn't as cool as you want it to be.
